dataList.prevDesc: Um urso de pelúcia olha para nós com uma expressão triste. Várias unhas afiadas estão empalando seu corpo.

successDesc:
{0} gave the bear plush a hug.

Even as its nails dig into {0}'s skin...

... the happily bouncing bear plush seemed to have soothed the Sinner's feelings.
failureDesc:
{0} gave the bear plush a hug.

A particularly blunt nail digs into {0}'s skin...

... the happily bouncing bear plush seemed to have soothed the Sinner's feelings.

dataList.title: Rose Hunter
dataList.prevDesc: O Caçador de Rosas habilmente balança o Laço Farpado sobre sua cabeça.
dataList.eventDesc:
O laço está mirando direto em nós...

O laço, acionado pelos movimentos do caçador, voa direto em nossa direção.
successDesc:
With lightning-fast reflexes, {0} deflects the barbed lasso to the side.

The lasso, deflected, flies in the other direction.

The Rose Hunter hesitates, surprised by the turn of events.
failureDesc:
The barbed lasso struck {0} hard.

Watching the Sinner writhing in pain seems to have invigorated the Rose Hunter.

dataList.eventDesc: Talvez possamos visitar o Confessionário novamente; não fizemos muita coisa lá antes. Decidimos ir ao Confessionário, como aconselhado por alguns dos Pecadores. Por favor, venha aqui, caso queira confessar seus pecados e participar de uma consulta. Uma voz ecoa de dentro do confessionário. Talvez, se confessarmos nossos pecados, o caminho se abra diante de nós. Qual Pecador pode expor seu coração honesto?
successDesc: The entity past the divider of the Confessional expresses sorrow at {0}'s confession. Your sin requires heavy introspection. Discipline your sin with this whip; it will help. A thorny whip slides under the Confessional divider. As we pick up the whip, the space around us warps as a new path opens.
failureDesc: {0} stepped up to confess, but their expression becomes increasingly uncomfortable. It must be unpleasant, to have to tell an honest story about themselves to a complete stranger. When the Sinner's tale ends, the figure past the divider shares words of consolation and advice. Perhaps disciplining your sins with this whip may help. A thorny whip slides gently under the Confessional divider. Perhaps the confession was the key; the space around us warps, and a new path opens before us.

dataList.eventDesc:
"Que pena; não havia mais aventuras esperando por eles."

"Era hora do Cavaleiro e do Escudeiro voltarem para casa."

"Para casa, onde sua Família tem resistido e esperado por seu retorno."

"Se você quiser saber o que aconteceu depois disso, por favor, vá através dos espinheiros."
dataList.behaveDesc: Quem abrirá caminho entre os espinhos?
successDesc:
{0} walked into the brambles, cutting open a path for us to cross.

Thanks to {0}, the other Sinners were able to make their way through the brambles with only a few scratches.
failureDesc:
{0} walked into the brambles, trying to cut open a path for the rest of us.

Try as they might, however, the brambles were simply too thick to cross without bloodshed.

Every Sinner was riddled with thorns by the time we made it through the brambles.
